subject: Baseball
Falls
Stadiums and Arenas
Deaths (Fatalities)
lead_paragraph: A middle-aged man wearing a Braves cap fell more than 40 feet during a game against the Yankees. He was pronounced dead after being taken to a hospital.
snippet: A middle-aged man wearing a Braves cap fell more than 40 feet during a game against the Yankees. He was pronounced dead after being taken to a hospital.
